avalancheActivity.comment: The snowpack is mostly stable. In some places in the high alpine regions, especially on fresh drifts of blown snow, a small, clustered avalanche can be triggered under higher loads.
avalancheActivity.highlights: The danger of Avalanche is low. Be careful in fresh Snowdrift accumulations!

snowpackStructure.comment:
There is little snow, and the peaks and ridges are in some places blown bare. During the last deterioration, about 10 cm of New fallen snow fell, on Sunny slope below 2000 m on terrestrial ground.
In the high alpine regions, weak layers may be present in the old snow cover.
On prominent ones, the snow has already been frozen off and then frozen over, forming a drift.

tendency.highlights:
Thursday will be mostly sunny with some transparent high clouds. SW winds will pick up in the evening, but it will remain cool.
Friday will be cloudy. The weekend will be cloudy and foggy, windy and snowy.

weatherForecast.comment:
It will be sunny, with only a few translucent clouds during the day. It will be windy, with moderate northerly winds in the High alpine regions, which will weaken a little in the morning.
It will be around -8 °C at 1500 m and -12 °C at 2000 m.

avalancheActivity.comment: Snowpack is mostly stable. In some places in the High alpine regions, especially on fresh snowdrift accumulations of blown snow, a small, clustered avalanche can be triggered under higher loads.
avalancheActivity.highlights: The danger of Avalanche is low. Be careful in fresh snowdrift accumulations!

snowpackStructure.comment:
There is little snow, and the peaks and ridges are in some places blown bare. During the last deterioration, about 10 cm of New fallen snow fell, on Sunny slope below 2000 m on terrestrial ground.
In the high alpine regions, weak layers may be present in the old snow cover.
On prominent ones, the snow has already been frozen off and then frozen over, forming a drift.

tendency.highlights:
Thursday will be mostly sunny with some transparent high clouds. In the afternoon, low clouds will thicken on the coastal side of the Alps and lift towards the Ridge. SW winds will pick up in the evening, but it will remain cool.
Friday will be cloudy, with occasional showers.
The weekend will be cloudy and foggy, windy and snowy.

weatherForecast.comment:
It will be sunny, with only a few translucent clouds during the day. It will be windy, with moderate northerly winds in the High alpine regions, which will weaken a little in the morning. A SW wind will blow down in the afternoon, bringing more humid air to the coastal side of the Alps. Low clouds may develop in the valleys and slope fog in the mountains.
It will be around -8 °C at 1500 m and -12 °C at 2000 m.
